Package br.ufal.ic.p2.jackut

Class System

java.lang.Object
br.ufal.ic.p2.jackut.System
public class System extends Object

Class that represents the system.

  • Constructor Details

    • System

      public System()

      Constructs a new System responsible for managing users and sessions.

      Initializes the lists of users and sessions.

      See Also:
      • User

  • Method Details

    • setUsuario

      public void setUsuario(User usuario) throws AccountAlreadyExistsException

      Adds a user to the system.

      Parameters:
      usuario - User to be added.
      Throws:
      AccountAlreadyExistsException - Exception thrown if the user is already registered.
      See Also:
      • User

    • abrirSessao

      public String abrirSessao(String login, String senha) throws LoginSenhaInvalidsException

      Logs a user into the system, creating their session ID and returning it.

      Parameters:
      login - User's login.
      senha - User's password.
      Returns:
      ID of the user's session.
      Throws:
      LoginSenhaInvalidsException - Exception thrown if the login or password is invalid.
      See Also:
      • User

    • getUsuario

      public User getUsuario(String login) throws UserIsNotRegisterException

      Retrieves a user from the system by their login.

      Parameters:
      login - User's login.
      Throws:
      UserIsNotRegisterException - Exception thrown if the user is not registered.
      See Also:
      • User

    • getSessaoUsuario

      public User getSessaoUsuario(String id) throws UserIsNotRegisterException

      Retrieves a logged-in user from the system by their session ID.

      Parameters:
      id - Session ID of the user.
      Throws:
      UserIsNotRegisterException - Exception thrown if the user is not registered.
      See Also:
      • User

    • getUsers

      public Map<String,User> getUsers()

      Retrieves all users from the system.

      Returns:
      Map with all users in the system.
      See Also:
      • User

    • adicionarAmigo

      public void adicionarAmigo(User usuario, User amigo) throws UserAlreadyHaveRelationException, UserAlreadySentConviteException, UserAutoRelationException, UserIsEnemyException

      Adds a friend to the user if they are not already friends, have already requested friendship, or have received a friend request from the user.

      Parameters:
      amigo - Friend's login to be added.
      Throws:
      UserAlreadyHaveRelationException - Exception thrown if the user is already friends with the logged-in user.
      UserAutoRelationException - Exception thrown if the user tries to add themselves as a friend.
      UserAlreadySentConviteException - Exception thrown if the user has already requested friendship from the friend.
      UserIsEnemyException - Exception thrown if the user is an enemy of the friend.

    • enviarRecado

      public void enviarRecado(User remetente, User destinatario, String recado) throws SelfSentErrandException, UserIsEnemyException

      Sends a message to the specified user.

      Parameters:
      destinatario - Recipient's login.
      recado - Message to be sent.
      Throws:
      SelfSentErrandException - Exception thrown if the user tries to send a message to themselves.
      UserIsEnemyException - Exception thrown if the user is an enemy of the recipient.

    • getComunidade

      public Community getComunidade(String nome) throws CommunityNotExistsException

      Retrieves a community from the system by its name.

      Parameters:
      nome - Name of the community.
      Returns:
      Community with the specified name.
      Throws:
      CommunityNotExistsException - Exception thrown if the community does not exist.

    • criarComunidade

      public void criarComunidade(User dono, String nome, String descricao) throws CommunityAlreadyExistisException

      Creates a community in the system.

      Parameters:
      dono - User who owns the community.
      nome - Community name.
      descricao - Community description.
      Throws:
      CommunityAlreadyExistisException - Exception thrown if the community already exists with the given name.
      See Also:
      • Community

    • getDescricaoComunidade

      public String getDescricaoComunidade(String nome) throws CommunityNotExistsException

      Retrieves the description of a community from the system by its name.

      Parameters:
      nome - Name of the community.
      Returns:
      Description of the community with the specified name.
      Throws:
      CommunityNotExistsException - Exception thrown if the community does not exist.

    • getDonoComunidade

      Parameters:
      nome - Name of the community.
      Returns:
      Owner of the community with the specified name.
      Throws:
      CommunityNotExistsException - Exception thrown if the community does not exist.

    • getMembrosComunidade

      public String getMembrosComunidade(String nome) throws CommunityNotExistsException

      Retrieves the members of a community in a formatted string.

      Parameters:
      nome - Name of the community.
      Returns:
      Members of the community with the specified name in a formatted string.
      Throws:
      CommunityNotExistsException - Exception thrown if the community does not exist.

      public String getComunidades(User usuario)

      Parameters:
      usuario - User.
      Returns:
      Communities of which the user is a member.

    • adicionarComunidade

      public void adicionarComunidade(User usuario, String nome) throws CommunityNotExistsException, UserAlreadyInACommunityException

      Adds a user to a community.

      Parameters:
      usuario - User.
      nome - Name of the community.
      Throws:
      CommunityNotExistsException - Exception thrown if the community does not exist.
      UserAlreadyInACommunityException - Exception thrown if the user is already in the community.

    • lerMensagem

      public String lerMensagem(User usuario) throws DontHaveMessagesException

      Reads a message for the user.

      Parameters:
      usuario - User.
      Returns:
      The message read by the user.
      Throws:
      DontHaveMessagesException - Exception thrown if the user has no messages.

    • enviarMensagem

      Sends a message to a community.

      Parameters:
      comunidade - Community.
      msg - Message to be sent.

    • adicionarIdolo

      public void adicionarIdolo(User usuario, User idolo) throws UserAutoRelationException, UserAlreadyHaveRelationException, UserIsEnemyException

      Adds a user as an idol.

      Parameters:
      usuario - User.
      idolo - User to be added as an idol.
      Throws:
      UserAutoRelationException - Exception thrown if the user tries to add themselves as an idol.
      UserAlreadyHaveRelationException - Exception thrown if the user already has a relation with the specified user.
      UserIsEnemyException - Exception thrown if the user is an enemy of the specified user.

    • getFas

      public String getFas(User usuario)

      Retrieves the fans (idols) of a user in a formatted string.

      Parameters:
      usuario - User.
      Returns:
      Fans (idols) of the user in a formatted string.

    • adicionarPaquera

      public void adicionarPaquera(User usuario, User paquera) throws UserAutoRelationException, UserAlreadyHaveRelationException, UserIsEnemyException

      Adds a user as a crush (romantic interest).

      Parameters:
      usuario - User.
      paquera - User to be added as a crush.
      Throws:
      UserAutoRelationException - Exception thrown if the user tries to add themselves as a crush.
      UserAlreadyHaveRelationException - Exception thrown if the user already has a relation with the specified user.
      UserIsEnemyException - Exception thrown if the user is an enemy of the specified user.

    • getPaqueras

      public String getPaqueras(User usuario)

      Retrieves the crushes (romantic interests) of a user in a formatted string.

      Parameters:
      usuario - User.
      Returns:
      Crushes (romantic interests) of the user in a formatted string.

    • adicionarInimigo

      public void adicionarInimigo(User usuario, User inimigo) throws UserAutoRelationException, UserAlreadyHaveRelationException

      Adds a user as an enemy.

      Parameters:
      usuario - User.
      inimigo - User to be added as an enemy.
      Throws:
      UserAutoRelationException - Exception thrown if the user tries to add themselves as an enemy.
      UserAlreadyHaveRelationException - Exception thrown if the user already has a relation with the specified user.

    • verificarInimigo

      public void verificarInimigo(User usuario, User inimigo) throws UserIsEnemyException

      Checks if a user is an enemy of another user.

      Parameters:
      usuario - User.
      inimigo - User to be checked as an enemy.
      Throws:
      UserIsEnemyException - Exception thrown if the user is an enemy of the specified user.

    • removerUsuario

      public void removerUsuario(User usuario, String id) throws UserIsNotRegisterException

      Removes a user from the system, along with all associated information, including relationships, sent messages, and profile.

      Parameters:
      usuario - User to be removed from the system.
      id - ID of the user's session.
      Throws:
      UserIsNotRegisterException - Exception thrown if the user is not registered in the system.

    • zerarSistema

      public void zerarSistema()

      Resets the system's information.

    • encerrarSistema

      public void encerrarSistema() throws AttributeNotFilledException

      Saves the registration to a file and terminates the program.

      Reaching the end of a script (end of a file) is equivalent to finding this command.

      In this case, the command has no parameters and will save at this time only the registered users.

      Throws:
      AttributeNotFilledException - Exception thrown if any attribute is not filled.
